title: How long would it take to travel 3 billion miles at the speed of light? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nothing with mass can travel at the speed of light but if you could the trip time 3 billion miles would be instantaneous ,0 time , and in fact the trip to any part of the visible universe will also be instantaneous so in fact you will be at all points in the visible universe at once . ?? Get your mind about that one !
3,000,000,000 miles divided by 670,600,000 miles per hour (that is roughly the speed of light) equals about four and a half hours. *Edit, changed the last word from years to hours.
